item.title: Dancing Mountain Arts is my creative expression. I enjoy a variety of artistic expression from working in copper to teaching dance. On these pages you will find one of a kind pieces of art. There are no templates, jigs or patterns. Each piece is created freehand, so each piece is unique.
item.description:
Dancing Mountain Arts is my creative expression. I enjoy a variety of artistic expression from working in copper to teaching dance. On these pages you will find one of a kind pieces of art. There are no templates, jigs or patterns. Each piece is created freehand, so each piece is unique.

I hope you enjoy looking at my work. I enjoyed creating them. â€” Jeanne
